services package

Submodules

services.review_service module

services.review_service.add_review(user_id, prod_id, data)[source]

Add a new review to the database.

Parameters:

  • user_id (int) – The ID of the user submitting the review.

  • prod_id (int) – The ID of the product being reviewed.

  • data (dict) – A dictionary containing review details, including “rating” and optional “description”.

Raises:

ValueError – If required fields are missing or if a database integrity error occurs.

Returns:

The newly added review object.

Return type:

Review

services.review_service.delete_review(user_id, prod_id)[source]

Delete a review.

Parameters:

  • user_id (int) – The ID of the user who wrote the review.

  • prod_id (int) – The ID of the product associated with the review.

Raises:

ValueError – If the review is not found.

services.review_service.delete_review_admin(review_id)[source]

Delete a review as an administrator.

Parameters:

review_id (int) – The ID of the review to be deleted.

Raises:

ValueError – If the review is not found.

services.review_service.flag_review(review_id)[source]

Flag a review for administrative attention.

Parameters:

review_id (int) – The ID of the review to be flagged.

Raises:

ValueError – If the review is not found.

Returns:

The flagged review object.

Return type:

Review

services.review_service.get_all_reviews_by_customer(customer_id)[source]

Retrieve all unflagged reviews submitted by a specific customer.

Parameters:

customer_id (int) – The ID of the customer.

Returns:

A query object containing the reviews.

Return type:

sqlalchemy.orm.query.Query

services.review_service.get_all_reviews_by_product(prod_id)[source]

Retrieve all unflagged reviews for a specific product.

Parameters:

prod_id (int) – The ID of the product.

Returns:

A query object containing the reviews.

Return type:

sqlalchemy.orm.query.Query

services.review_service.get_specific_review_details(review, item, customer)[source]

Retrieve detailed information about a specific review.

Parameters:

  • review (Review) – The review object.

  • item (dict) – A dictionary containing product information.

  • customer (dict) – A dictionary containing customer information.

Returns:

A dictionary containing detailed review information.

Return type:

dict

services.review_service.update_review(user_id, prod_id, data)[source]

Update an existing review.

Parameters:

  • user_id (int) – The ID of the user updating the review.

  • prod_id (int) – The ID of the product associated with the review.

  • data (dict) – A dictionary containing updated review details.

Raises:

ValueError – If the review is not found or if a database integrity error occurs.

Returns:

The updated review object.

Return type:

Review
